title: Emerald and Diamond Vaal in 22K Gold - Ratan Vaal
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features one square-cut Emerald and brilliant-cut Diamonds. The Gold has a subtle matte finish to accentuate the brilliance of the gemstones.
features: The Vaal showcases a unique, contemporary design inspired by traditional floral motifs. It features a centrally set square Emerald, framed by sparkling diamonds. The bracelet employs a delicate lattice design connecting the diamonds and emerald, enhancing the overall brilliance. The goldwork includes a meticulous beaded pattern along the band, adding a touch of traditional South Indian aesthetic to this modern piece. The setting allows light to maximize the sparkle of the diamonds.
colors: Predominantly Gold with the vibrant green of the Emerald and the bright white sparkle of the Diamonds. This color combination offers a classic and regal appeal.
occasions: and festivals. Its versatility makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and modern social gatherings. This Vaal can be a statement piece for special occasions or add a touch of elegance to everyday wear.
description: This exquisite Vaal offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and longevity. The carefully selected Emerald and brilliant-cut diamonds ensure maximum sparkle and brilliance. This piece is a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, offering both cultural significance and timeless elegance.
